sources.title: The Lazarus Syndrome
sources.description: An adulterous newspaper reporter (Ronald Hunter), who has just experienced a heart attack, pesters a black doctor (Louis Gossett Jr.) into investigating the questionable medical practices taking place at the hospital where both are residing.

metadata.Plot: An adulterous newspaper reporter, who has just experienced a heart attack, pesters a black doctor into investigating the questionable medical practices taking place at the hospital where both are residing.
metadata.Actors: Louis Gossett Jr., Ronald Hunter, E.G. Marshall
